name: World of Kingdoms
description:
World of Kingdoms combines the finest features of strategy, role-playing and city builder games.

Dive into a beautifully drawn fantasy world!
Build your very own medieval kingdom!
Equip it with defences in order to protect yourself from enemy armies!
Take part in missions and gain experience!
Train your army and attack other players!
Take part in leagues and fight until the last second for first place!
Manage the tax income of your kingdom and gather wealth!
Use the power of magic to boost your army!
Expand and strengthen your realm!

And remember, in World of Kingdoms you will never be left alone – you can form alliances with other players from all around the world and fight together for victory!

Features
• FREE to play
• Multiplayer ONLINE Role Playing Game
• 9 exciting missions in unexplored realms
• Over 90 buildings, 40 military units and 9 magic boosters you can use on your way to victory
• Real-time battles against other players
• Innovative card-based fight system that requires both quick and strategic thinking
• Support by other players through the alliance system
• Social game elements: comments, message boards and player profiles
• Numerous side tasks for a non-linear gameplay
• Google Play Games achievements and leaderboards
• Progress saved in the Google Play Games, so that you can switch effortlessly between your Android-devices

World of Kingdoms is going to be constantly developed and improved. Look out for updates!

Any problems or suggestions? You can reach us at wok@support.nurogames.com

Note: A network connection is required to play the game.
